name: Saxx Hot Shot Boxer Briefs - Men's
description: No one wants Sweaty Saxx. With highly breathable fabric and quick-dry technology, the Hot Shot boxers beat the heat where it matters. An articulated front pouch stabilizes the boys while preventing unwanted friction.DropTemp™ wicking fabric and mesh insets keep you cool.Anti-microbial treatment controls odor.Wide, no-fold waistband wicks and stays dry.Ballpark Pouch™ provides support and stability.Parallel side panels offer a barrier between one's package and inner thigh.Seamless on the inside front to prevent irritation and reduce chafing.
